messages.content: Task: You are a text game player, your goal is to put things in their proper locations and improve your score. You can only perform one action at a time.

Action history: No action was taken now.
Inventory: You are carrying:  a red onion  a wet tank top
Another room: Unknown
Current environment: -= Backyard =-I just think it's great that you've just entered a backyard. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.You can make out a BBQ. The BBQ is recent. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? You make out a clothesline. The clothesline is typical. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a patio chair. The patio chair is stylish. However, the patio chair, like an empty patio chair, has nothing on it. You make out a patio table. The patio table is stylish. But there isn't a thing on it. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a workbench. On the workbench you see a wet cardigan.There is an open screen door leading west.

Current environment: -= Kitchen =-You are in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.You can see an opened fridge here. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? You make out an opened kitchen cupboard. The kitchen cupboard is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! Were you looking for an oven? Because look over there, it's an oven. Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this? You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a dishwasher. The dishwasher is empty, what a horrible day! You see an opened cutlery drawer. The cutlery drawer is empty! What a waste of a day! You can make out a trash can. The trash can is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! You make out a dining table. You see a wet white shirt on the dining table. You see a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you make out a wet orange T-shirt. You make out a stove. The stove is conventional. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You see a dining chair. The dining chair is solid. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a ladderback chair. On the ladderback chair you see a rotten red tuna and a dirty saucepan. Hmmm... what else, what else?There is an open screen door leading east.
